postData.contentHtml:
This pops up everytime I boot up... I don't know why. and I don't really want to go down the rabbit hole of boot sectors and corebooting my laptop again tbh.

1failed to open \EFI\BOOT\? - Invalid Parameter
2failed to load image ? - invalid parameter
3start_image() returned invalid parameter, falling back to default loader
postData.title: Random boot error at the start of linux
